question: Tapai ko store bata mobile kinyo, aba return kasari garne?
context: Hamro store ma kinieko kunai pani product return garna, kinieko 7 din bhitra receipt ra original packaging saath leu. Product defective bhae, customer support lai sampark garnus.
response: Tapai le kinieko mobile return garna receipt ra original packaging saath 7 din bhitra hamro store ma lyai dinu parcha.

question: Delivery charge kati ho?
context: Hamro delivery charge ko rate tapai ko location anusar farak huncha. Sahar bhitra delivery ko lagi Rs. 50 ho, ra sahar bahira Rs. 100 ho.
response: Delivery charge sahar bhitra Rs. 50 ra sahar bahira Rs. 100 ho.

question: Warranty claim kasari garne?
context: Warranty claim garnako lagi tapai sanga valid warranty card ra kinieko receipt hunu parcha. Tapai le hamro customer support team lai email garnu saknuhuncha ya showroom ma sampark garnus.
response: Warranty claim garnako lagi valid warranty card ra receipt saath showroom ma aunuhos, ya email garera contact garnus.

question: Tapai ko store ma keti ko dress pani cha?
context: Hamro store ma purush, mahila, ra balbalika ka dress haru upalabdha cha. Mahila ko lagi sari, kurta, jeans, t-shirt, adi paaincha.
response: Ho, hamro store ma mahila ko lagi sari, kurta, jeans, t-shirt adi dress pani upalabdha cha.

question: Order cancel kasari garne?
context: Order cancel garna ko lagi tapai le hamro website ma login gari 'My Orders' section ma jane ani 'Cancel Order' option select garna saknuhuncha. Arko upaya bhaye, customer support lai sampark garnus.
response: Order cancel garna website ma login garera 'My Orders' section bata cancel garna saknuhuncha, ya customer support lai sampark garnus.

question: Hamro order track kasari garne?
context: Order track garna hamro website ko 'Track Order' section ma tapai ko order ID halera status herna saknuhuncha.
response: Tapai ko order track garna website ko 'Track Order' section ma order ID halera status hernus.

question: Product exchange garna milcha?
context: Exchange policy anusar, defective ya wrong item maatra exchange garna milcha. Exchange garnako lagi receipt ra original packaging awasyak huncha.
response: Ho, defective ya wrong item matra exchange garna milcha. Receipt ra original packaging saath ma lyaunuhos.

question: Discount kahile samma cha?
context: Hamro discount offer yehanko festive season samma upalabdha cha. Offer ko samapt tarikh 15th January ho.
response: Discount yehanko festive season samma cha ra offer 15th January samma upalabdha cha.

question: Gift card kinera kasari use garna milcha?
context: Hamro store le digital gift card ko suvidha dincha. Gift card ko code tapai ko checkout process ma 'Apply Gift Card' ma halnu parcha. Gift card balance aba total bill ma adjust huncha.
response: Gift card use garna checkout ma 'Apply Gift Card' section ma code halera apply garnus. Balance tapai ko bill ma adjust huncha.

question: Delivery time kati din lagcha?
context: Hamro delivery policy anusar, sahar bhitra order 2-3 din ma deliver huncha. Sahar bahira delivery ko lagi 5-7 din lagna sakcha.
response: Delivery time sahar bhitra 2-3 din ra sahar bahira 5-7 din lagcha.

question: Customer support ma sampark kasari garne?
context: Customer support team sanga sampark garna email, phone, ra website chat feature ko upayog garnu saknuhuncha. Hamro email address support@store.com ho, phone number 1234567890 ho, ra chat feature hamro website ko homepage ma cha.
response: Customer support ma email (support@store.com), phone (1234567890), ya website chat feature bata sampark garnus.

question: Online payment safe ho?
context: Hamro online payment gateway PCI-DSS certified cha, jun le tapai ko payment details secure rakcha. Sabai transaction encrypted technology bata garincha.
response: Ho, online payment safe cha kinaki hamro gateway PCI-DSS certified cha ra encrypted technology upayog huncha.

question: Membership kasari lina sakcha?
context: Membership le tapai lai exclusive discounts, early sale access, ra reward points dincha. Membership lina hamro website ma 'Sign Up for Membership' section ma form bharna parcha.
response: Membership lina hamro website ma 'Sign Up for Membership' section ma form bharera register garnus.

question: Out of stock item chai aune chance cha?
context: Out of stock item haru ko availability supplier ko stock anusar depend garcha. Tapai interested item ko 'Notify Me' option ma click gare email notification pauna saknuhuncha.
response: Out of stock item ko lagi 'Notify Me' option ma click garnus, email notification aune cha jab product available huncha.

question: Damaged product ko lagi k garne?
context: Damaged product received bhae ma, tapai hamro customer support team lai 48 ghanta bhitra sampark garnus. Product ko photo email ya chat ma pathaera complain file garnu parcha.
response: Damaged product ko lagi 48 ghanta bhitra customer support ma photo pathaera complain file garnus.

question: Tapai haru wholesale orders linchha?
context: Hamro store le wholesale orders ko lagi special rates dincha. Wholesale order ko lagi minimum quantity criteria cha, ra details ko lagi sales@store.com ma email garnus.
response: Ho, hamro store wholesale orders lincha. Email (sales@store.com) ma contact garnus for details.

question: Account password birsiyo vane k garne?

response: Password birsiyeko cha bhane 'Forgot Password' ma click garnus, ra email bata naya password set garnus.

question: Cash on delivery option available cha?

question: Sale ma liyaeko item return garna milcha?
context: Sale items ko lagi return policy limited cha. Only defective ya damaged item return garna milcha. Return ko lagi hamro customer support sanga sampark garnus.

question: Referral program cha?

question: Warranty period extend garna milcha?
context: Certain products ko lagi extended warranty plan available cha. Purchase ko bela additional charge tirera warranty extend garna milcha.
response: Ho, additional charge tirera warranty extend garna milcha.

question: Missing item complaint kasari garne?
context: Missing item ko lagi order ID ra package ko photo sanga complaint form fill garnus. Investigation pachi refund ya replacement provide garincha.
response: Order ID ra package ko photo sanga complaint form fill garnus.

question: Delivery time customize garna milcha?
context: Delivery time customize garna hamro flexible delivery option ko use garnus. Custom date ra time slot select garna milcha.
response: Ho, flexible delivery option use gari time customize garna milcha.

question: Kati bhandakari order track garna milcha?
context: Order dispatch pachi tracking link email ya SMS ko madhyam bata provide huncha. Live tracking 24/7 available huncha.
response: Dispatch pachi tracking link aunecha, 24/7 live tracking available cha.

question: Gift card ko balance kasari check garne?
context: Gift card ko balance check garna website ko 'Check Balance' section ma card number enter garnus. Balance instant display huncha.
response: Website ma 'Check Balance' section ma card number enter garnus.

question: Order modify garna milcha?
context: Order dispatch bhanda pahila modify request garna milcha. Dispatch pachi modification possible hudaina.
response: Dispatch bhanda pahila matra order modify garna milcha.

question: Customer feedback kasari submit garne?
context: Customer feedback submit garna website ma 'Feedback' section fill garnus. Feedback le hamro service improvement ma madad garcha.
response: Website ma 'Feedback' section fill garnus.

question: Damaged item ko case ma ke garne?
context: Damaged item ko case ma product ko photo upload garnus ra complaint form fill garnus. Replace ya refund process 48 ghanta vitra start huncha.
response: Damaged product ko photo upload gari complaint form fill garnus.

question: Tapai haru weekend delivery dinchha?
context: Weekend delivery select garna ko lagi additional Rs. 100 lagcha. Option checkout page ma available cha.
response: Ho, weekend delivery Rs. 100 extra charge ma available cha.

question: Membership cancel garna milcha?
context: Membership cancel garna customer profile ma 'Cancel Membership' option select garnus. Cancellation request 24 ghanta ma process huncha.
response: Profile ma 'Cancel Membership' option select gari cancel garna milcha.

question: Bulk order return kasari garne?
context: Bulk order return ko lagi support team lai sampark garnus. Bulk order return ma additional charges lagna sakcha.
response: Bulk return ko lagi support team sanga sampark garnus.

question: Out of stock item notify kasari huncha?
context: Out of stock item ma 'Notify Me' button click garnus. Stock ma aune sathi email ya SMS ko madhyam bata notify huncha.
response: Out of stock item ko lagi 'Notify Me' button click garnus.

question: Special packaging ko lagi charge kati ho?
context: Special packaging ko lagi Rs. 100 extra charge lagcha. Option checkout page ma select garna milcha.
response: Special packaging ko lagi Rs. 100 extra lagcha.

question: Customer support email address ke ho?
context: Hamro customer support email help@hamrostore.com ho. Issue ko lagi email garnu parcha.
response: Email address help@hamrostore.com ho.

question: Subscription auto-renew off kasari garne?
context: Subscription auto-renew off garna 'My Account' ma login gari 'Subscription Settings' ma auto-renew option off garnus.
response: My Account ma 'Subscription Settings' bata auto-renew off garna milcha.

question: Product ko warranty kasari claim garne?
context: Product warranty claim garna valid warranty card ra purchase receipt ko photo upload garnus. Claim request 48 ghanta vitra process huncha.
response: Warranty card ra receipt upload gari claim request submit garnus.

question: Email verification link expire bhayo, aba ke garne?
context: Email verification link expire bhaye 'Resend Verification Link' button click garnus. Naya link email ma aunecha.
response: Resend Verification Link button click gari naya link paunus.

question: Return kehi din pachi garna milcha?
context: Return policy anusar product purchase ko 7 din bhitra return garna milcha. 7 din pachi return possible hudaina.
response: Ho, 7 din bhitra return garna milcha, 7 din pachi possible hudaina.

question: Referral program ma kati jana refer garna milcha?
context: Referral program ma unlimited users refer garna milcha. Har ek referral le reward dincha.
response: Unlimited users refer garna milcha. Har ek referral ma reward aunecha.

question: Order ko invoice download kasari garne?
context: Invoice download garna 'My Orders' section ma order select gari 'Download Invoice' button click garnus.
response: My Orders ma order select gari 'Download Invoice' click garnus.

question: Password reset link kaile expire huncha?
context: Password reset link 24 ghanta ma expire huncha. Expire bhaye pheri 'Forgot Password' option use garnus.
response: Password reset link 24 ghanta ma expire huncha.

question: Damaged product return policy ke cha?
context: Damaged product ko lagi 7 din bhitra return garna milcha. Return request ma product photo attach garnu parcha.
response: 7 din bhitra damaged product return garna milcha, photo attach garnus.

question: Product installation service cancel kasari garne?
context: Installation service cancel garna 'My Orders' ma service select gari 'Cancel Service' button click garnus.
response: My Orders ma 'Cancel Service' button click gari service cancel garnus.

question: Tapai haru ko return pickup service available cha?
context: Return pickup service major cities ma available cha. Area ma pickup available cha ki chaina confirm garna support team sanga contact garnus.
response: Major cities ma return pickup service available cha.

question: Order confirm bhayeko kasari thaha paune?
context: Order confirm bhaye pachi confirmation email ra SMS send garincha. Email ma order details huncha.
response: Order confirm bhaye email ra SMS ma details aunecha.

question: Product rating kasari dina milcha?
context: Product rating dine ko lagi 'My Orders' section ma order select gari 'Rate Product' option use garnus.
response: My Orders ma 'Rate Product' option use gari rating dinus.

question: Expired gift card ko renewal huncha?
context: Expired gift card renewal policy available chaina. Expiry bhanda pahila card use garnus.
response: Gift card renewal possible chaina, expiry bhanda pahila use garnus.

question: Store location find garna kasari garne?
context: Hamro website ma 'Store Locator' section ma city ya area enter garnus. Nearest store location display huncha.
response: Website ko 'Store Locator' use gari nearest store paunus.

question: Payment failed bhaye alternative option cha?
context: Payment failed bhaye alternative payment options jastai eSewa, Khalti, ya bank transfer use garnus.
response: eSewa, Khalti, ya bank transfer bata payment garna saknuhuncha.

question: Tapai haru ko support team ko working hours ke ho?
context: Support team Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM available cha. Off hours ma email drop garnus.
response: Support team Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM available huncha.

question: Product exchange request ko status kasari check garne?
context: Exchange request ko status 'My Requests' section ma check garna milcha. Status updates continuously update huncha.
response: 'My Requests' section ma exchange status check garnus.

question: Courier service ko tracking link kaile aunecha?
context: Courier dispatch bhaye pachi 24 ghanta vitra tracking link email ya SMS ma send garincha.
response: Dispatch pachi 24 ghanta vitra tracking link send huncha.

question: Account delete garna cha, process ke ho?
context: Account delete garna 'My Profile' ma 'Delete Account' option select garnus. Confirmation ma 'Yes' click garnus.
response: My Profile ma 'Delete Account' option select gari delete garnus.

question: Festive sale ma pre-order available cha?
context: Festive sale ko lagi certain products ma pre-order option cha. Pre-order ma advance payment required huncha.
response: Ho, certain products ma festive sale pre-order option cha.

question: Pre-order ko payment kasari garne?
context: Pre-order ko payment ko lagi online payment methods jastai eSewa, Khalti, ya debit/credit card use garna milcha. Pre-order ma cash on delivery option available chaina.
response: Pre-order ma online payment jastai eSewa, Khalti, ya card use garna milcha.

question: Custom order place garna milcha?
context: Custom order ko lagi support team lai sampark garnus. Product details ra requirements specify garna parcha.
response: Custom order ko lagi support team sanga sampark garnus ra details provide garnus.

question: Tapai haru ko chat support 24/7 cha?
context: Chat support Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM available cha. Off hours ma email support use garnus.
response: Chat support Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM available cha.

question: Product cancel bhaye refund automatic huncha?
context: Product cancel bhaye automatic refund 5-7 working days ma original payment method ma process huncha.
response: Cancel bhaye automatic refund 5-7 working days ma process huncha.

question: Tapai haru same-day delivery dinchha?
context: Same-day delivery option certain cities ma available cha. Order 12:00 PM bhitra place gare same-day ma delivery huncha.
response: Ho, certain cities ma 12:00 PM bhitra order gare same-day delivery cha.

question: Account ma address kasari update garne?
context: Address update garna 'My Account' ma login gari 'Address Book' section ma new address add garnus.
response: My Account ko 'Address Book' section ma new address add garnus.

question: Tapai haru ko offline store ko timing ke ho?
context: Hamro offline store ko timing Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM ho. Sunday ko din store band huncha.
response: Offline store ko timing Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM ho.

question: Gift voucher kasari purchase garne?
context: Gift voucher ko lagi website ma 'Gift Cards' section ma visit garnus ra desired amount select gari purchase garnus.
response: 'Gift Cards' section ma visit gari desired amount select garnus.

question: Discount code kaile expire huncha?
context: Discount code ko expiry date code issue hune bela mention garincha. Expiry date email ya offer page ma check garnus.
response: Discount code ko expiry date email ya offer page ma check garnus.

question: Tapai haru return ma courier charges cover garnuhuncha?
context: Return ma courier charges only defective ya wrong product case ma cover garincha. Change of mind return ma charges customer le tirnu parcha.
response: Defective product ma courier charges cover huncha, change of mind ma chaina.

question: Delivery address wrong cha, modify garna milcha?
context: Delivery address order dispatch bhanda pahila modify garna milcha. Dispatch pachi address change garna possible hudaina.
response: Dispatch bhanda pahila address modify garna milcha, dispatch pachi chaina.

question: Gift wrapping option checkout pachi select garna milcha?
context: Gift wrapping option checkout process bhanda pahila select garna parcha. Checkout complete bhaye pachi option available hudaina.
response: Checkout process bhanda pahila gift wrapping select garnus.

question: Mobile number verify garna sakina bhane ke garne?
context: Mobile number verify garna sakina bhaye resend OTP request garnus. OTP auna problem bhaye support team lai sampark garnus.
response: Resend OTP garnus ya problem solve garna support team lai sampark garnus.

question: Festive sale ma exchange policy valid huncha?
context: Festive sale ma regular exchange policy valid cha. Exchange only unused ra original packaging ma product ko lagi apply huncha.
response: Ho, festive sale ma regular exchange policy valid cha.

question: Missing invoice ko lagi duplicate copy milcha?
context: Missing invoice ko duplicate copy ko lagi 'My Orders' section bata download garnus ya support team sanga request garnus.
response: My Orders section ma download garnus ya support team lai request garnus.

question: Product ko stock availability confirm kasari garne?
context: Stock availability product page ma mention cha. Out of stock product ma 'Notify Me' button use garna milcha.
response: Product page ma stock status hernus, out of stock ma 'Notify Me' click garnus.

question: Order ko gift message customize garna milcha?
context: Gift message customize garna checkout page ma 'Add Gift Message' option select garnus. Limited characters ko message add garna milcha.
response: Checkout page ma 'Add Gift Message' option use gari customize garnus.

question: Product warranty registration process ke ho?
context: Warranty registration ko lagi product ko serial number ra purchase receipt online registration form ma fill garnus.
response: Serial number ra purchase receipt registration form ma fill garnus.

question: Coupon code apply bhayeko confirm kasari huncha?
context: Coupon code apply bhaye total amount ma discount deduct bhayeko dekhincha. Confirm ko lagi checkout page ko summary check garnus.
response: Checkout summary ma discount deduct dekhi coupon apply confirm garnus.

question: Installment payment option available cha?
context: Certain products ma installment payment option available cha. Details product page ma mention cha.
response: Ho, certain products ma installment payment available cha, product page ma check garnus.

question: COD order cancel kasari garne?
context: Cash on delivery (COD) order cancel garna 'My Orders' section ma cancel request submit garnus. Dispatch bhanda pahila cancel garna milcha.
response: 'My Orders' section ma cancel request submit garnus.

question: Damaged product replace garna kati time lagcha?
context: Damaged product replacement process 3-5 working days ma complete huncha. Replacement request submit garnus.
response: Replacement process 3-5 working days ma complete huncha.

question: KYC verification process kasari garne?
context: KYC verification ko lagi photo ID ra address proof ko scan copy upload garnus. Verification 24-48 hours ma complete huncha.
response: Photo ID ra address proof upload garnus, verification 24-48 hours ma complete huncha.

question: Discount code apply garna milena bhane ke garne?
context: Discount code apply garna milena bhaye code validity check garnus. Validity thik cha bhane support team lai contact garnus.
response: Code validity check garnus, thik cha bhane support team lai sampark garnus.

question: Pre-booked product ko delivery date kasari check garne?
context: Pre-booked product ko delivery date 'My Orders' section ma check garna milcha. Estimated delivery timeline mention huncha.
response: 'My Orders' ma delivery date check garnus.

question: Order place gardai chhu, payment fail bhayo. Aba ke garne?
context: Payment fail bhaye retry option use garnus ya alternative payment method try garnus. Issue solve nabhaye support team sanga sampark garnus.
response: Retry option ya alternative payment method use garnus.

question: Email address change kasari garne?
context: Email address update garna 'My Profile' section ma login gari 'Edit Email' option select garnus. New email verify garnus.
response: 'My Profile' ma 'Edit Email' option use gari change garnus.

question: Tapai haru ko loyalty program kasari kaam garcha?
context: Loyalty program ma purchase gareko har ek rupee ko points milcha. Points redeem garera discounts ya free gifts lincha.
response: Purchase gareko har ek rupee ko points milcha, jun discounts ya gifts ko lagi redeem garna milcha.

question: Refund ko confirmation kasari paune?
context: Refund confirmation email ya SMS ko madhyam bata provide huncha. Refund process complete bhaye update garincha.
response: Refund complete bhaye email ya SMS ma confirmation aunecha.

question: Return ko lagi pickup service kaile aunecha?
context: Return pickup request approve bhaye pachi 48 hours bhitra pickup arrange garincha. Pickup timing SMS bata inform garincha.
response: Pickup request approve bhaye pachi 48 hours ma arrange garincha.

question: Bundle products ma exchange possible cha?
context: Bundle products ma exchange entire bundle return garera matra possible cha. Individual product exchange available chaina.
response: Bundle products ko exchange ma entire bundle return garna parcha.

question: Late delivery ko lagi compensation dinchha?
context: Late delivery ko lagi compensation provide garincha if delay company ko fault le bhayeko ho. Case review pachi decision garincha.
response: Company fault le delay bhaye compensation milna sakcha.

question: Subscription plan upgrade kasari garne?
context: Subscription plan upgrade garna 'My Subscriptions' section ma login gari 'Upgrade Plan' option use garnus. Upgrade instantly apply huncha.
response: 'My Subscriptions' ma 'Upgrade Plan' use gari plan upgrade garnus.

question: Wrong product receive bhaye aba ke garne?
context: Wrong product ko photo upload gari 'Return/Exchange' form fill garnus. Correct product dispatch huncha ya refund process huncha.
response: Photo upload gari 'Return/Exchange' form fill garnus.

question: Digital product refund policy ke ho?
context: Digital product refund only technical issues ko case ma garincha. Issue confirm bhaye pachi refund initiate garincha.
response: Technical issues ko case ma matra digital product refund garincha.

question: Account ma saved payment method delete garna milcha?
context: Saved payment method delete garna 'My Wallet' section ma login gari delete option select garnus.
response: 'My Wallet' section bata payment method delete garnus.

question: Delivery attempt fail bhaye aba ke garne?
context: Delivery attempt fail bhaye courier partner next business day ma delivery attempt garcha. Update tracking link bata check garnus.
response: Next business day ma attempt huncha, tracking link bata check garnus.

question: Tapai haru ko EMI options minimum purchase ma available cha?
context: EMI options Rs. 10,000 ya tesko mathi ko purchase amount ma available huncha. Details checkout page ma herna milcha.
response: EMI options Rs. 10,000 mathi ko purchase amount ma available cha.

question: Out-of-stock product ko replacement available cha?
context: Out-of-stock product ko replacement available chaina. Refund ya alternative product select garna milcha.
response: Replacement available chaina, refund ya alternative product choose garnus.

question: Delivery ma delay cha, urgent product ko lagi ke garne?
context: Urgent delivery request ko lagi express shipping select garnus ya support team lai sampark garnus. Additional charges lagna sakcha.
response: Express shipping select garnus ya support team lai sampark garnus.
